name: Strike Squadron: Caracar√°
description: Story-driven 2D Space sim inspired by 90's space sims. You are not an ace pilot, nor is your squadron the best of the best. You just want to do your job, whatever the cost.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or Equivalent Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 600 Series or Higher Storage: 200 MB available space
